 A7 V8 (for a PPVRIP) and if you think this is fake your dumb. A PPVRIP is when someone watches a pay per view film (usually in a hotel room) and records the video (usually to a DVR like TiVo).
It is in 4:3, so it looks like your watching a VCR tape.
